column4: just totem (or vlc) filename.swf  and you need the right plugins installed.
well my vlc is not playing it... what plugin do i need?

vlc shouldn't need any plugins I don't think, for totem you'll probably need the ubuntu-restricted-extras package (specifically gstreamer I assume)... But then again, if vlc won't play it, it might be just the file is faulty...
